synopsis.text:
With the unexpected loss of her parents in a tragic accident, Oriko Seki, a vibrant 12-year-old, finds herself under the care of her grandmother, Mineko, at the serene hot spring inn, Haru no Ya. Initially, Oriko struggles with the rigorous training required to become a young innkeeper, but as she witnesses her grandmother's dedication and finesse, she develops a profound respect for the craft.

As Oriko embarks on her journey to master the art of running the inn, she finds unlikely companionship in the spectral entity, Uribou, and other enigmatic friends. Together, they guide her through the trials and tribulations of growing up, transforming the once reluctant Oriko into a determined and passionate young woman.

This heartwarming tale of laughter, tears, and personal growth follows Oriko as she navigates the challenges of her new life, ultimately embracing her destiny as the future caretaker of Haru no Ya.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
